items.sentence: Tom drank coffee and Mary smoked a cigarette.
Tom drank a lot when he was living in Boston.
Tom doesn't seem to know what's in that room.
Tom doesn't remember how to use the shredder.
Tom doesn't plan to do that unless he has to.
Don't wait too long to tell Tom how you feel.
The shoes I'm wearing don't fit me very well.
It's about thirty-minute walk to the station.
I'll go and get our coats from the cloakroom.
Can you hang the picture on the wall, please?
